name: Sales by Queue Type
query:
SELECT 
    s.ref_practitioner AS "Referring Practitioner:Data:200",

    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN q.que_type = 'New Patient' THEN s.total ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "New Patient:Currency:130",
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN q.que_type = 'Refer' THEN s.total ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "Refer:Currency:130",
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN q.que_type = 'Follow Up' THEN s.total ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "Follow Up:Currency:130",
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN q.que_type = 'Refer With Payment' THEN s.total ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "Refer with Payment:Currency:150",

    ROUND(SUM(s.total), 2) AS "Total:Currency:130",
    ROUND(SUM(s.discount_amount), 2) AS "Discount:Currency:130",
    ROUND(SUM(s.grand_total), 2) AS "Grand Total:Currency:130"
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` s
JOIN 
    `tabPatient Encounter` en 
    ON en.name = s.custom_patient_encounter
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabQue` q 
    ON q.name = en.que
WHERE 
    s.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY 
    s.ref_practitioner;
